SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description1Txt: PRESERVATION, RESTORATION AND MANAGEMENT OF HISTORICALLY AND CULTURALLY SIGNIFICANT PROPERTY IN GRAFTON AND OTHER VERMONT LOCATIONS, INCLUDING THE GRAFTON VILLAGE CHEESE COMPANY, THE GRAFTON INN AND THE RETREAT FARM.

ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.RecipientPersonNm: THE WINDHAM FOUNDATION - ATTN MS EL
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.FormAndInfoAndMaterialsTxt: THE FOUNDATION HAS AN APPLICATION FORM AND GUIDELINES AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST. A GRANT REQUEST IS BEST INITIATED THROUGH A LETTER DESCRIBING THE PROPOSED PROJECT, INCLUDING AN APPROXIMATE BUDGET, A REFERENCE TO OTHER FUNDING SOURCES, ENCLOSURE OF THE LATEST AVAILABLE BALANCE SHEET AND INCOME STATEMENT, AND A COPY OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE DETERMINATION LETTER AS TO THE TAX-EXEMPT STATUS OF THE APPLICANT.
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.RestrictionsOnAwardsTxt: THE WINDHAM FOUNDATION LIMITS ITS GRANTS TO ORGANIZATIONS LOCATED IN VERMONT. GRANTS ARE FURTHER LIMITED BY THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE TO TAX-EXEMPT ORGANIZATIONS. THROUGH ITS GRANT MAKING, THE WINDHAM FOUNDATION SEEKS TO SUPPORT ORGANIZATIONS CONCERNED WITH THE NEEDS AND QUALITY OF LIFE OF VERMONTERS. THOSE ORGANIZATIONS INCLUDE, BUT ARE NOT LIMITED TO, THOSE DEALING WITH: AGRICULTURAL PRESERVATION AND FOOD SYSTEMS; DISADVANTAGED YOUTH; ENVIRONMENTAL ENHANCEMENT; EDUCATION IN THE BROADER SENSE; PROMOTION OF THE ARTS, CRAFTS AND VERMONT TRADITIONS; MEETING BASIC HUMAN NEEDS; HISTORIC PRESERVATION WHERE IT SERVES A BROADER COMMUNITY PURPOSE; NATURAL LANDSCAPE PRESERVATION AND RECREATION.

RlnOfActyToAccomOfExmptPrpsGrp.RelationshipStatementTxt: FUEL SALES AND MISCELLANEOUS INCOME ARE PART OF THE ORGANIZATIONS OPERATIONS. THE SUBSIDIARY REIMBURSMENT OF EXPENSES ARE FROM RELATED OPERATING ENTITIES MANAGED AND PAID BY THE WINDHAM FOUNADATION.
